title: Greek Nachos

info: Absolutely NO TAKE OUT !! Or to go orders on the nachos!! NO Adding any ingredients! This is any assembly line that has a rhythm and a beat to it. When you add or take stuff off, it stalls the assembly line and makes your order take longer as well as other peoples' orders. So please keep this in mind with trying to customize your nachos.
